DOC.brief_summary: 45 pregnant woman undergo cesarean section enrol study november 2006 march 2007 . 2 ml 0.5 % levobupivacaine add 1 ml saline group I , 1 ml 15 µcg fentanyl group II 1 ml 1,5 µcg sufentanil group III intratechal administration . Hemodynamic parameter , characteristic sensory motor blockade , peri-operative postoperative visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain score , time first analgesic requirement adverse effect record .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Intratechal Levobupivacaine Adding With Sufetanil Fentanyl Ceserean Section
DOC.detailed_description: 45 pregnant woman undergo cesarean section enrol study november 2006 march 2007 . Using CSE technique , 2 ml 0.5 % levobupivacaine add 1 ml saline group I , 1 ml 15 µcg fentanyl group II 1 ml 1,5 µcg sufentanil group III intratechal administration . Hemodynamic parameter , characteristic sensory motor blockade , peri-operative postoperative visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain score , time first analgesic requirement adverse effect record .
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman single live fetus age 1845 year old classify ASA I , undergo elective cesarean section , include study november 2006 march 2007 Multiple pregnancy , preterm labor , eclampsia , preeclampsia , concomitant diabetes mellitus , allergy local anesthetic , fentanyl sufentanil , contraindication regional anesthesia exclusion criterion .
